aliases.name: push
aliases.command: gittey pull && gittey build && gittey commit && git push
aliases.description: builds site and then pushes changes

aliases.name: build
aliases.command: powershell ./clean.ps1 && bundle exec jekyll build && powershell ./siteclean.ps1

aliases.name: publish
aliases.command: gittey push; gittey checkout; gittey merge-from-branch; gittey build && gittey push && && git subtree push --prefix _site origin gh-pages; gittey checkout
aliases.description: publishes changes to the main branch and website

aliases.name: serve:all
aliases.description: serves site with drafts and future posts
